MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 and DG3 postcode areas of Sanquhar, Kirkconnell and Dumfries. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we havemanaged to restore supplies to a number of properties and have found an overhead line fault at Laigh Cairn we now expect your supply to be restored by 1am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:44pm on 8th January 2021.
